title: Ari Fleischer: Media May Be Biased, But Don't Tell the Press to Shut Up
description: President George W. Bush's former Press Secretary Ari Fleischer talks with Chuck Todd responds to a recent statement from Presidential Counselor Steve Bannon in which Bannon called the media, "the opposition." Fleischer also talks about why he believes the media is biased, and what it means for the new White House.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
